metadata.title: CVE-2018-12558 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The parse() method in the Email::Address module through 1.909 for Perl isvulnerable to Algorithmic complexity on specially prepared input, leadingto Denial of Service. Prepared special input that caused this problemcontained 30 form-field characters ("\f").

criterions.comment: libemail-address-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
